title: F1 2015 gratis en Humble Bundle. Quedan menos de 48 Hs
body:
https://youtu.be/o4fsa8P2pTU

https://humblebundle.imgix.net/misc/files/hashed/e47cf5e9dca3afb5e2413147bf7198f38db41e3f.jpg
https://humblebundle.imgix.net/misc/files/hashed/d78ae87d4cad7b71fb78d3972bc3c9f8dbffccbf.jpg
https://humblebundle.imgix.net/misc/files/hashed/8e173d1cc58b55c85811a84adcb1759f7f79c973.jpg
https://humblebundle.imgix.net/misc/files/hashed/e228546cb79f5c19b2c9e6ea8a161277f39a1a55.jpg
https://humblebundle.imgix.net/misc/files/hashed/7a5f10da02da1523616ceb1108e9501255d0e452.jpg
https://humblebundle.imgix.net/misc/files/hashed/a48c778b0c1df97b80559668518501616beac316.jpg

> SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
> Minimum:
> 
> Windows
> OS: Windows 7 64 bit or Windows 8 64 bit 
> Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 3.0GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 @ 3.2GHz 
> Memory: 4 GB RAM 
> Graphics: Intel 4th Gen Iris Graphics or AMD HD5770 or NVIDIA GTS450 
> DirectX: Version 11 
> Network: Broadband Internet connection 
> Storage: 20 GB available space 
> Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard 
> Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: DirectX 11 Graphics Card Required Intel: 4th Gen Iris or Higher, Intel Iris Pro Series AMD: HD5770 or Higher, HD6770 or Higher, HD7750 or Higher, R7 250 or Higher, R9 Series Nvidia: GTS450 or Higher, GT545 or Higher, GT640 or Higher, GT740 or Higher, GTX900 Series
> 
> Linux
> OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit) 
> Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX-6300 
> Memory: 4 GB RAM 
> Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA 640 series card or better with driver version 364.19 or later (tested) 
> Storage: 15 GB available space 
> Additional Notes: AMD and Intel GPUs are not supported at time of release. Nvidia requires 364.19 or newer drivers.
> 
> Recommended:
> 
> Windows
> OS: Windows 7 64 bit or Windows 8 64 bit 
> Processor: Intel Core i7 4770 or AMD FX 9370 
> Memory: 8 GB RAM 
> Graphics: Intel 5th Gen Iris Pro or AMD R9 290 or Nvidia GTX970 
> DirectX: Version 11 
> Network: Broadband Internet connection 
> Storage: 20 GB available space 
> Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard 
> Additional Notes: Intel, the Intel logo and Iris are trademarks of Intel Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
> 
> Linux
> OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit) 
> Processor: Intel i7 4770 
> Memory: 8 GB RAM 
> Graphics: NVIDIA 970 series card or better with driver version 364.19 or later (tested) 
> Storage: 15 GB available space 
> Additional Notes: AMD and Intel GPUs are not supported at time of release. Nvidia requires 364.19 or newer drivers.
> 
> Supported Languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese-Brazil, Japanese, Polish, Russian

[Link para conseguirlo](https://www.humblebundle.com/store/f1-2015?partner=igb)

Basta con loguearse en Humble Bundle y agregar al carrito de compras ( las cuentas son gratuitas)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Diosmo,realm=LAS,application-id=J8qpiO2I,discussion-id=j6PJAE5k,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-22T21:48:47.345+0000)
>
> http://generadordememesonline.com/media/created/vpknrq.jpg

Usualmente tu meme dice "papu de los papus" Me gusta esta versión

Es una lástima que este F1 en particular no tiene modo carrera, pero para correr con los primeros turbo híbridos y pasar un rato en la pista no viene nada mal.

Gracias por el datazo che, ¿cuánto te debo master?

> [{quoted}](name=martincarp,realm=LAS,application-id=J8qpiO2I,discussion-id=j6PJAE5k,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-22T21:55:58.609+0000)
>
> Es una lástima que este F1 en particular no tiene modo carrera, pero para correr con los primeros turbo híbridos y pasar un rato en la pista no viene nada mal.
> 
> Gracias por el datazo che, ¿cuánto te debo master?

Pagame el filtro, el cambio es gratis

Che, no tiene modo historia, si a eso te referís pero el modo campeonato tiene un poquito de RPG en las líneas.
F1 2018 Gratis en cualquier pagina pirata.

> [{quoted}](name=Salvor Hardin,realm=LAS,application-id=J8qpiO2I,discussion-id=j6PJAE5k,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-22T23:14:28.131+0000)
>

Al menos los pobres podemos saber que se siente jugar un juego legal una vez en la vida.
